DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety tolerability ALV003 healthy volunteer patient Celiac Disease
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Study Safety Tolerability ALV003 Healthy Adult Volunteers Subjects With Well-Controlled Celiac Disease
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase 1 , Two Stage , Single Dose , Single-Blind , Placebo Controlled , Dose Escalation , Crossover Study Safety Tolerability ALV003 Healthy Adult Volunteers Subjects With Well-Controlled Celiac Disease
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION Health Status 1 . Healthy volunteer must good health 2 . Celiac Disease must well control good health Either male nonlactating , nonpregnant female postmenopausal , sterile use least two acceptable highly effective birth control method . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 30 kg/m2 , EXCLUSION A positive urine test alcohol illegal drug screen . The subject receive experimental drug within 30 day present study . History substance abuse , within last 5 year Clinically significant abnormal lab value , determine PI Alcohol consumption > 2 standard drink equivalent per day12 . Positive pregnancy test within 7 day prior study drug administration . history medically significant condition consider PI adversely affect participation trial
